IsTransitionallyRelated(PitchClassSet, PitchClassSet)

Checks whether two pitch class set are transitionally related or not. Transpositionaaly related pitch-class sets in normal form have the same interval sequence.

Transpose(Int32)

Traspose. Transposition of a set of pitch classes may involve many changes, but it preserves interval-class content. As a result, it can be an important compositional means of creating a deeper unity bebeath a varied musical surface(p48).

Declaration
